title: Migrate all remaining inline tests to tests/ folder organized by module
Increase test coverage to at least 600 comprehensive tests
description:
Expand test coverage from current ~530 tests to at least 600 comprehensive tests across all modules.

Current Status:
- Total tests: ~530
- Visualizer: 102 integration tests (recently migrated)
- Phase 7: 40 tests
- Phase 6/7 UI: 27 tests
- Other modules: ~361 tests

Target Coverage Areas:
1. Communication Module
   - Serial/TCP/WebSocket connection tests
   - Message parsing and protocol tests
   - Error handling and reconnection logic
   - Flow control and buffer management

2. G-Code Parser & Preprocessors
   - All 14 preprocessor tests
   - Edge cases and error conditions
   - Arc expansion and coordinate transformations
   - Mesh leveling and calibration

3. Firmware Controllers
   - GRBL, TinyG, g2core, FluidNC, Smoothieware
   - Command parsing and response handling
   - State machine transitions
   - Override and real-time commands

4. Core Module
   - Event system tests
   - State management
   - Message handling
   - Controller lifecycle

5. UI Module
   - Component behavior tests
   - State synchronization
   - User interaction flows
   - Error handling and validation

6. Utilities
   - File I/O operations
   - Data processing
   - Export functionality
   - Configuration management

Goals:
- 600+ total tests (70 new tests minimum)
- All tests in tests/ folder (no inline tests)
- Focus on integration tests testing public API
- Comprehensive edge case coverage
- Error condition testing
- Realistic usage scenarios

Benefits:
- Higher confidence in code correctness
- Better regression detection
- Improved maintainability
- Documentation through tests
- Production-ready quality assurance
